title: help me
content: I want to do E&C in PEs ring road campus nut i did not get the desired rank so taking EE in PESU is a good option ?? and then try to change the branch to E & C .

comments.body: 6k should I take ece in top 3 or cs in dsce bit ? Concerned only about placement
Then take cs if u want placement.
5.4k I don't know what I will get in pes tbh.
Branch change is pretty unlikely here. The cutoff CGPAs are always pretty high
so branch change is difficut .. you mean to say
Yup. You need to be one of your batch toppers to be eligible in the first place.
In my batch cse for RR was 9.45, ece for rr was 8.44, while cse in ec campus was 7.7. if ur confident enough you should try.
Branch changes are rare, as they're based on vacant seats and your CGPA. you need to be in the batch's 1% to get a branch change.
I got 3.4k..maybe I will get ece which I dont want...going to prefer MIT pune over it
